It's a good game, you can see how Valve is constantly trying to improve the game. It can be seen that Valve did a good job, there are no bugs in the game and excellent optimization.
There is also a very good anti-cheat system. Which very quickly recognizes all cheaters and bans, so there are no cheaters in the game.
In addition, Valve is very generous and made the game free. A very good solution that has expanded and improved the CS:GO community.
Every time I start a game, I feel a surge of energy because I understand that now I have to play with very friendly, strong and honest players.
I AM VERY HAPPY TO PLAY CS:GO
